settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your account preferences and security
settings.language.cardDesc: Choose your preferred language for the app interface.
settings.profilePicture.title: Profile Picture
settings.profilePicture.desc: Upload a profile picture to personalize your account
settings.profilePicture.hint: JPG, PNG or GIF. Max size 5MB.
settings.profileInfo.title: Profile Information
settings.profileInfo.desc: Update your personal information and role
settings.profileInfo.emailNote: Email cannot be changed. Contact support if you need to update your email.
settings.accountInfo.title: Account Information
settings.access.title: Accessibility Settings
settings.access.desc: Customize the app to meet your accessibility needs
settings.access.fontSize.desc: Choose a comfortable text size for reading
settings.access.contrastDesc: Increase contrast between text and background for better visibility
settings.access.resourcesDesc: Learn more about using assistive technologies with this app
settings.access.resources.keyboardDesc: Learn all available keyboard shortcuts for efficient navigation.
settings.access.resources.screenReaderDe: Step-by-step guide for using this app with screen readers.
settings.access.resources.feedbackDesc: Report accessibility issues or suggest improvements.
settings.access.resources.assistiveDesc: Get help setting up and using assistive technologies.
settings.notifications.title: Notification Preferences
settings.notifications.desc: Choose how you want to be notified about important events
settings.notifications.medication.title: Medication Reminders
settings.notifications.medication.desc: Get notified when medications are due
settings.notifications.appointment.title: Appointment Reminders
settings.notifications.urgent.title: Urgent Messages
settings.notifications.urgent.desc: Get notified immediately for urgent messages
settings.notifications.system.title: System Alerts
settings.notifications.system.desc: Get notified about system updates and maintenance
settings.notifications.delivery.title: Delivery Methods
settings.notifications.email.title: Email Notifications
settings.notifications.sms.title: SMS Notifications
settings.notifications.push.title: Push Notifications
settings.notifications.push.desc: Receive notifications in the app or browser
settings.privacy.title: Privacy Settings
settings.privacy.desc: Control how your information is shared and used
settings.privacy.profileVisibility.label: Profile Visibility
settings.privacy.profileVisibility.desc: Who can see your profile information
settings.privacy.shareContact.label: Share Contact Information
settings.privacy.shareContact.desc: Allow other caregivers to see your contact details
settings.privacy.invitations.label: Allow Invitations
settings.privacy.invitations.desc: Allow others to invite you to care teams
settings.privacy.dataRetention.label: Data Retention
settings.privacy.dataRetention.desc: How long to keep your data (in days)
settings.privacy.analytics.label: Opt Out of Analytics
settings.security.title: Password & Authentication
settings.security.desc: Manage your password and authentication settings
settings.security.extra.title: Security Settings
settings.security.extra.desc: Additional security options for your account
settings.security.mfa.label: Multi-Factor Authentication
settings.security.mfa.desc: Add an extra layer of security to your account
settings.security.login.label: Login Notifications
settings.security.login.desc: Get notified when someone logs into your account
settings.security.deviceTrust.label: Device Trust
settings.security.deviceTrust.desc: Remember trusted devices to reduce login prompts
settings.security.sessionTimeout.label: Session Timeout
settings.data.title: Export Your Data
settings.data.desc: Download a copy of your data for backup or transfer purposes
settings.data.includes.title: What's included in your export:
settings.data.includes.clients: Client records you have access to
settings.data.lastExport.label: Last export:
settings.data.generate.desc: Generate a comprehensive export of all your healthcare data
settings.data.notes.title: Important Notes:
settings.data.notes.mayTakeTime: Data exports may take several minutes to generate
settings.data.notes.encrypted: Exported data is encrypted and password-protected
settings.data.notes.expire: Export links expire after 24 hours for security
settings.data.notes.permissions: Only data you have permission to access is included
dashboard.error.title: Unable to load dashboard
dashboard.error.fallback: Something went wrong. Please try again.
dashboard.stats.careSummaryAllGood: All medications are up to date. Great job staying on track!
dashboard.stats.careSummaryTasks: You have {{count}} task(s) scheduled for today.
todaysTasks.title: Today's Tasks
todaysTasks.noTasks: No tasks scheduled for today. Enjoy your day!
quickActions.title: Quick Actions
quickActions.addClientDesc: Add a new client to your care list
quickActions.sendMessageDesc: Send a message to your caregiver
quickActions.quickAddDesc: What would you like to add?
clients.noneDescription: Start by adding your first client to begin tracking their care.
clients.title: Your Clients
activity.title: Recent Activity
activity.noneDescription: Activity will appear here as you and your team interact with clients.
